item.title: 4 Back Office - English Ver
item.description: 1 Login to POSPAL Back Office 2 Add new items, photos, setup Kitchen Printer on Back Office 3 Edit item name, Photo Kitchen Printer on Back end 4 Add new Category on Back Office 5 Change kitchen printer for multiple items on Back Office 6 Change Categories or items Position on Back Office 7 Add Flavour choice for Items on Back Office 8 Set Staff Login ID and Password and Limitation on Back Office 9 Make a Combo on Back Office 10 Download Transaction Report on Back Office 11 Add Kitchen Printer Section on Back Office 12 Set Public Holiday Surcharge on Back Office 13 Set Whole store 10% off Discount on Back Office 14 Check and Export AdaPay Transaction Report 15 Turn Off QR Code Online Ordering on Back Office 16 Turn On QR Code Online Ordering on Back Office 17 Change Trading hours on Back Office Choose Episode on Top Right Corner
